mapper.select: SELECT HOUSE_IDX, HOUSE_NAME, HOUSE_INFO, HOUSE_IMAGE, HOUSE_KIND, HOUSE_ZIPCODE, HOUSE_ADDR1, HOUSE_ADDR2, HOUSE_ADDR3, HOUSE_TOTAL_PERSONS, HOUSE_PERSONS, HOUSE_TOTAL_PRICE, HOUSE_PRICE, HOUSE_PERSON_PRICE, HOUSE_CNT, MEMBER_IDX FROM HOUSE ORDER BY HOUSE_IDX DESC

SELECT HOUSE_IDX, HOUSE_NAME, HOUSE_INFO, HOUSE_IMAGE, HOUSE_KIND, HOUSE_ZIPCODE, HOUSE_ADDR1, HOUSE_ADDR2, HOUSE_ADDR3, HOUSE_TOTAL_PERSONS, HOUSE_PERSONS, HOUSE_TOTAL_PRICE, HOUSE_PRICE, HOUSE_PERSON_PRICE, HOUSE_CNT, MEMBER_IDX FROM HOUSE
ORDER BY HOUSE_IDX DESC

SELECT HOUSE_IDX, HOUSE_NAME, HOUSE_INFO, HOUSE_IMAGE, HOUSE_KIND, HOUSE_ZIPCODE, HOUSE_ADDR1, HOUSE_ADDR2, HOUSE_ADDR3, HOUSE_TOTAL_PERSONS, HOUSE_PERSONS, HOUSE_TOTAL_PRICE, HOUSE_PRICE, HOUSE_PERSON_PRICE, HOUSE_CNT, MEMBER_IDX, HI_IDX, HI_CLEAN_PRICE, HI_DEPOSIT, HI_GUEST, HI_SPACE, HI_CSPACE, HI_BAD, HI_ROOM, HI_CHECKIN, HI_CHECKOUT, HI_TOTAL_STAR, FROM HOUSE H INNER JOIN HOUSE_INFO HI on H.HOUSE_IDX = HI.HOUSE_IDX WHERE HOUSE_IDX = #{house_idx} ORDER BY HOUSE_IDX DESC
